model_name.info: The Cohere embedding model to use

truncate.info: Truncation strategy for input text that exceeds the model's maximum token limit

max_retries.info: Maximum number of retries for failed API requests

user_agent.info: User agent string for API requests

request_timeout.info: Timeout in seconds for API requests

success.embeddings_created: Cohere embeddings created successfully with model: {model}

errors.creation_failed: Unable to create Cohere Embeddings. Please verify the API key and model parameters, and try again. Error: {error}
errors.fetch_models_failed: Failed to fetch Cohere models. Error: {error}

logs.updating_model_list: Updating model list with available Cohere models
